<<<<<<< HEAD
The canticles or balades of Salomon, phraselyke declared in Englysh metres, by William Baldwin Bible. O.T. Song of Solomon. English. Baldwin. Baldwin, William, ca. 1518-1563?
[112] p.
By William Baldwin, seruaunt with Edwarde Whitchurche], [Imprinted at London : M. D. XLIX [1549]
Translated by William Baldwin. Imprint in part from colophon. Preface to the king signed: At London the first of Iune. 1549. Printer's device on n4 verso (McKerrow 112 alpha). In verse. Signatures: A⁴ a-n⁴ (n4 recto blank). Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[112] p.
By William Baldwin, seruaunt with Edwarde Whitchurche], [Imprinted at London : M. D. XLIX [1549]
Translated by William Baldwin. Imprint in part from colophon. Preface to the king signed: At London the first of Iune. 1549. Printer's device on n4 verso (McKerrow 112 alpha). In verse. Signatures: A⁴ a-n⁴ (n4 recto blank). Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
William Baldwin, seruaunt
